item.title: How I setup my self-host Wordpress and automated backup with Kopia and Cloudflare R2 for FREE
item.description:
Introduction

Few months back, my wife has started blogging on worpress and I setup a Wordpress instances with docker compose on Oracle Cloud alwayfree tier VM. Every thing went smooth, and then ocurred my mind after a month, “What about backup?”, maybe in time in future, Oracle may remove the alway-free tire, the I have to migrate to new cloud provider and it is also general recomendation to setup a backup.
